mapper.select: SELECT infra_book_qtcode_source.id, infra_book_qtcode_source.source_name, infra_book_qtcode_source.source_form, infra_book_qtcode_source.dtcode_id, infra_book_qtcode_source.applica_scens, infra_book_qtcode_source.chapter_id, infra_book_qtcode_source.book_no, infra_book_qtcode_source.source_id, infra_source_info.source_origin, infra_source_info.source_url, infra_source_info.source_status, infra_source_info.period, infra_source_info.grade, infra_source_info.subject, infra_source_info.edition, infra_source_info.volume, infra_source_info.chapter, infra_source_info.source_knnm, infra_source_info.applica_objects, infra_source_info.format, infra_source_info.size, infra_source_info.size_unit, infra_source_info.lable_tag, infra_source_info.remaks, infra_source_info.storage_address, infra_source_info.spare_filed1, infra_source_info.spare_filed2, infra_source_info.upload_user_id, infra_source_info.audit_user1_id, infra_source_info.audit_user2_id, infra_source_info.create_time, infra_source_info.audit_status, infra_source_info.dept_id, infra_source_info.source_category FROM infra_book_qtcode_source INNER JOIN infra_source_info ON infra_book_qtcode_source.source_id = infra_source_info.id where infra_book_qtcode_source.deleted = 0 and infra_book_qtcode_source.chapter_id=#{chapter_id}
